Description

Klee is a fast-paced arcade game. Clean up game rooms with your auto-blaster guns and simple virtual button control! Oh, and don't forget to recycle the stabilized $energy_cores$ to save the world!

History

Web Html5 Preview

Dec 2018

Taipei Game Show | Demo

Jan 2019 | tgs.tca.org.tw

Summer Game Show | Demo

July 2019 | sgs.tca.org.tw

Features

  • Fast-paced, auto-aiming and gunning platformer
  • Simple virtual button controls: super easy to pick up
  • Randomized gameplay; addictive game loops
